scripts.restart:ue:macos: osascript -e "tell application \"UnrealEditor\" to quit" && open UETest1.uproject && sleep 20
scripts.clean:win: powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name UnrealEditor -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path .vs,Binaries,Intermediate,Saved -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'Cleaned build artifacts'"
scripts.clean:macos: rm -rf .vs Binaries Intermediate Saved && echo 'Cleaned build artifacts'
